* Web1arp

  4LVS+NginxDR4

```bash
#!/bin/bash
if [ $# -ne 1 ]
then
    echo 'error!'"usage:$0 on|off"
    exit 1
fi
case $1 in
    on)
        echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/lo/arp_ignore
        echo "2" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/lo/arp_announce
        echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/all/arp_ignore

from Crypto.Cipher import AES, PKCS1_OAEP
from Crypto.PublicKey import RSA
from Crypto.Random import get_random_bytes


def Encrypt(filename):
    data = ''
    # 
    with open(filename, 'rb') as f:
        data = f.read()
    with open(filename, 'wb') as out_file:
        #  - 
        recipient_key = RSA.import_key(open('zmy_rsa.pub').read())
        #  16 
        session_key = get_random_bytes(16)
        # Encrypt the session key with the public RSA key
        cipher_rsa = PKCS1_OAEP.new(recipient_key)
        out_file.write(cipher_rsa.encrypt(session_key))
        # Encrypt the data with the AES session key
        cipher_aes = AES.new(session_key, AES.MODE_EAX)

        ciphertext, tag = cipher_aes.encrypt_and_digest(data)
        out_file.write(cipher_aes.nonce)
        out_file.write(tag)
        out_file.write(ciphertext)


Encrypt("e://test/music.mp3")

```

from Crypto.PublicKey import RSA
from Crypto.Cipher import AES, PKCS1_OAEP


def Descrypt(filename):
    code = 'nooneknows'
    with open(filename, 'rb') as fobj:
        # 
        private_key = RSA.import_key(open('zmy_rsa').read(), passphrase=code)
        #  
        enc_session_key, nonce, tag, ciphertext = [fobj.read(x)
                                                   for x in (private_key.size_in_bytes(),
                                                             16, 16, -1)]
        cipher_rsa = PKCS1_OAEP.new(private_key)
        session_key = cipher_rsa.decrypt(enc_session_key)
        cipher_aes = AES.new(session_key, AES.MODE_EAX, nonce)
        # 
        data = cipher_aes.decrypt_and_verify(ciphertext, tag)

    with open(filename, 'wb') as wobj:
        wobj.write(data)


Descrypt("e://test/music.mp3")

        ciphertext, tag = cipher_aes.encrypt_and_digest(data)
        out_file.write(cipher_aes.nonce)
        out_file.write(tag)
        out_file.write(ciphertext)

3. GFS

4. 

5. CLVM

6. 

### 

* Centos7Centos8

* SELINUX

* 

* NetworkManager

* `/etc/hosts`

```bash
127.0.0.1   localhost localhost.localdomain localhost4 localhost4.localdomain4
::1         localhost localhost.localdomain localhost6 localhost6.localdomain6
10.8.7.82   web3.liuxp.com
10.8.7.83   web4.liuxp.com
10.8.7.41   storage1.liuxp.com
10.8.7.42   storage2.liuxp.com
```

scp

```bash
scp /etc/hosts 10.8.7.42:/etc/
```

### 

* 

* ISCSI[ISCSI](https://nustarain.gitee.io/2023/07/04/ISCSI/)ISCSIwebstorage1ISCSIweb`/dev/sdb`storage2ISCSIweb`/dev/sdc`

* web3web4web3web4

* 

```bash
yum -y install pacemaker pcs
systemctl start pcsd
systemctl enable pcsd
echo "q" | passwd --stdin hacluster
```

pcsd`hacluster`

* 

web3web4web4web3

```bash
ssh-keygen
ssh-copy-id -i /root/.ssh/id_rsa.pub web4.liuxp.com
```

web3

* 

```bash
pcs cluster auth web3.liuxp.com web4.liuxp.com
Username: hacluster
Password:q
node3: Authorized
node4: Authorized
pcs cluster setup --name nginx_cluster web3.liuxp.com web4.liuxp.com
pcs cluster setup --name nginx_cluster web3.liuxp.com web4.liuxp.com --force # 
pcs cluster start
pcs cluster status
pcs cluster enable --all
pcs status corosync
```

`--force`success



```bash
pcs cluster destroy
```

* GFS

```bash
yum install -y lvm2-cluster gfs2-utils fence-agents-all
lvmconf --enable-cluster
modprobe gfs2
lsmod | grep gfs2 
```

GFS

* 

```bash
pcs property set no-quorum-policy=ignore
pcs property set stonith-enabled=false

pcs resource create dlm ocf:pacemaker:controld allow_stonith_disabled=true op monitor interval=30s clone interleave=true ordered=true

pcs resource create clvmd ocf:heartbeat:clvm op monitor interval=30s clone interleave=true ordered=true

pcs constraint order start dlm-clone then clvmd-clone
pcs constraint colocation add clvmd-clone with dlm-clone
pcs property set no-quorum-policy=freeze
```

<kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>C</kbd><kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>V</kbd>

* CLVM

```bash
pvcreate /dev/sdb
pvcreate /dev/sdc
vgcreate -cy qavg /dev/sdb /dev/sdc
lvcreate -L 12G -n qa qavg
```

[LVM](https://nustarain.gitee.io/2023/07/04/LVM/)

* 

```bash
# 
mkfs.gfs2 -p lock_dlm -t nginx_cluster:gfs2 -j 2 /dev/qavg/qa
# 
mkdir /mnt/cluster
# 
pcs resource create fs_gfs2 Filesystem device="/dev/qavg/qa" directory="/mnt/cluster" fstype="gfs2" options="noatime,nodiratime" op monitor interval=10s clone interleave=true

# 
pcs constraint order start clvmd-clone then fs_gfs2-clone
pcs constraint colocation add fs_gfs2-clone with clvmd-clone
pcs constraint show
df
```

`df``/dev/qavg/qa`

keepalived

#### keepalived

1.  DB-master  DB-slave  Keepalived

```bash
yum install -y keepalived
```

2. 

```
cp /etc/keepalived/keepalived.conf{,.bak}
```

3. /etc/keepalived/keepalived.conf

|     | route_id  | vrrp_instance | state  | interface | virtual_router_id | priority | virtual_ipaddress |
| :-------: | :-------: | :-----------: | :----: | :-------: | :---------------: | :------: | :---------------: |
| mariadb-1 | db_master |  mariadb-ha   | BACKUP |  ens224   |        60         |   100    |  172.21.8.33/24   |
| mariadb-2 | db_slave  |  mariadb-ha   | BACKUP |  ens224   |        60         |    90    |  172.21.8.34/24   |

* mariadb-1 `/etc/keepalived/keepalived.conf`  



```bash
! Configuration File for keepalived

global_defs {
   notification_email {
     liuxp731@qq.com	# 
   }
   notification_email_from Alexandre.Cassen@firewall.loc
   smtp_server 127.0.0.1
   smtp_connect_timeout 30
   router_id db_master	# 
   vrrp_skip_check_adv_addr
   vrrp_strict
   vrrp_garp_interval 0
   vrrp_gna_interval 0
}
```

 vrrp_script   mariadb 

```bash
vrrp_script check_mariadb {
   script "/etc/keepalived/checkmariadb.sh"
   interval 2
}
```

VRRPD   

```bash
vrrp_instance mariadb-ha {
    state BACKUP	# 
    interface ens224
    nopreempt		# 
    virtual_router_id 60
    priority 100	# 
    advert_int 1
    authentication {
        auth_type PASS
        auth_pass 1111
    }
    track_script {	# vrrp_script
        check_mariadb
    }
    virtual_ipaddress {	# VIP
        172.21.8.50/24
    }
}
```

* mariadb-2 `/etc/keepalived/keepalived.conf`  



```bash
! Configuration File for keepalived

global_defs {
   notification_email {
     liuxp731@qq.com
   }
   notification_email_from Alexandre.Cassen@firewall.loc
   smtp_server 127.0.0.1
   smtp_connect_timeout 30
   router_id db_slave
   vrrp_skip_check_adv_addr
   vrrp_strict
   vrrp_garp_interval 0
   vrrp_gna_interval 0
}
```

 vrrp_script   mariadb 

```bash
vrrp_script check_mariadb {
   script "/etc/keepalived/checkmariadb.sh"
   interval 2
}
```

VRRPD 

```bash
vrrp_instance mariadb-ha {
    state BACKUP
    interface ens224
    virtual_router_id 60
    priority 90
    advert_int 1
    authentication {
        auth_type PASS
        auth_pass 1111
    }
    track_script {
        check_mariadb
    }
    virtual_ipaddress {
        172.21.8.50/24
    }
```

4. `/etc/keepalived/checkmariadb.sh`

```bash
#!/bin/bash
if ! lsof -i:3306 &> /dev/null
then
    systemctl stop keepalived
fi
```

5. `keepalived`

```bash
systemctl start keepalived.service
```

```bash
yum install -y gcc make pcre pcre-devel zlib zlib-devel openssl openssl-devel
yum install -y libxml2 libxml2-devel
```

[NGINX](https://nustarain.gitee.io/2023/07/04/nginx/)NGINXyum

* configure

```bash
./configure --prefix=/usr/local/php --enable-mbstring --enable-fpm --with-mysql --with-mysqli
```

* 

```bash
make  # make
make install
```

* 

```bash
cp /usr/local/php/etc/php-fpm.conf.default /usr/local/php/etc/php-fpm.conf
```

* 

```bash
cp sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm /etc/init.d/php-fpm
```

* 

```bash
chmod +x /etc/init.d/php-fpm
```

* 

```bash
cp /etc/init.d/php-fpm /sbin/php-fpm
```

PHP

```bash
php-fpm start
php-fpm reload
php-fpm stop
```
* 

```bash
lsof -i:9000
```

### SELinux

#### selinux`/home/student`selinux`/root`selinux

 * studentselinux

```bash
[root@servera home]# ls -dZ student/
unconfined_u:object_r:user_home_dir_t:s0 student/
```

<!-- more -->

**user_home_dir_t**`/home/student`selinux

 * rootselinux

```bash
[root@servera /]# ls -Zd /root/
system_u:object_r:admin_home_t:s0 /root/
```

**admin_home_t**`/root`selinux

* 

```bash
[root@servera /]# semanage fcontext -a -t admin_home_t '/home/student(/.*)?'
```

`'/home/student(/.*)?'``(/.*)?`

* 

```bash
[root@servera /]# restorecon -RFvv /home/student/
Relabeled /home/student from unconfined_u:object_r:user_home_dir_t:s0 to system_u:object_r:admin_home_t:s0
Relabeled /home/student/.bash_logout from unconfined_u:object_r:user_home_t:s0 to system_u:object_r:admin_home_t:s0
Relabeled /home/student/.bash_profile from unconfined_u:object_r:user_home_t:s0 to system_u:object_r:admin_home_t:s0
Relabeled /home/student/.bashrc from unconfined_u:object_r:user_home_t:s0 to system_u:object_r:admin_home_t:s0
Relabeled /home/student/.ssh from unconfined_u:object_r:ssh_home_t:s0 to system_u:object_r:admin_home_t:s0
Relabeled /home/student/.ssh/known_hosts from unconfined_u:object_r:ssh_home_t:s0 to system_u:object_r:admin_home_t:s0
Relabeled /home/student/.ssh/authorized_keys from unconfined_u:object_r:ssh_home_t:s0 to system_u:object_r:admin_home_t:s0
Relabeled /home/student/.bash_history from unconfined_u:object_r:user_home_t:s0 to system_u:object_r:admin_home_t:s0

```

* studentselinux
